website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice if you need an affordable lounger that doesn't cut any corners on quality or comfort. Designed to please both babies and parents.
pros: Cradling contours and a center depression hold babies in place and provide a sense of security
Lounger can be tossed in the washing machine for thorough cleaning
Comes with a built-in handle for fuss-free portability
Heavy-duty quality with a lightweight price tag
cons: Might not fit in smaller washing machines

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for getting baby to sleep alone
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get my 3 week baby to sleep on his own AT ALL - he had to be on top of one of us, sleeping on our chests, or being held. This was the first thing we felt safe putting him in to sleep (in his crib). I know it's not totally recommended but we did do some testing first to make sure he wouldn't couldn't move out of it, and showed the pediatrician as well who agreed it was a safe position. This is the first thing that got him sleeping alone and it's been a dream come true. If something happens to this one I'll certainly buy another.
customer_reviews.author: ADTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing amazing!! My son loves his boppy and uses it all the time. He even used it when he was in the hospital for three weeks! It's his absolute favorite thing to lay on. Best money ever spent, goes everywhere with us!! Must buy you won't be sorry!!! Also great for helping your baby sit more in an upright position if they have bad reflux!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase for a new mom
customer_reviews.text: Buy this. I could not live without this lounger. My daughter is 5 weeks old now and she has sat in this since day 1. It's so nice for her to be involved with us during the day sitting in this lounger. I've also found its great for reducing reflux after feelings by keeping her slightly upright.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: My 2 month old does not like to be put down. Unlike my first born she won’t lay in the bassinet, doesn’t like the bouncy chair for very long, and forget the swing. I remembered how my first born loved to sit up and also nap in her regular boppy next to me. Then I found this lounger. Omg why didn’t I get this sooner! My baby loves this thing, it is soft and the padding cradles her perfectly, just how she likes to be cradled. She sits in it while I tend to other matters, or naps in it next to me in bed. Problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Baby - Cheap Product
customer_reviews.text: My little one loves this hoppy lounger!! He always wants to be close to us so when we need to put him down (to eat and whatnot), we put him on it inbetween us on the couch and he loves it! Super easy to clean as well. Update: dropped to 2 stars because although my son loves it, after the 3rd time washing it the side ripped open and a bunch of the stuffing came out in the wash. Very disappointed that this product was so cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Parlormaster

customer_reviews.title: Good for babies, even better for cats
customer_reviews.text: Great for propping a baby up to read to her. Deducted a star for the fact that it doesn't come with a removeable cover of some kind. Just to warn you, my cat stole this from my baby. The dent in this thing is a perfect cat size. This is the most expensive bed he's ever had, but wow, he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: I loved having this to plop my little gal in when ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved having this to plop my little gal in when she was really tiny. I have a ton of pictures of her sleeping in it. Now that she's over a year old I see things that we needed or didn't really need. I consider this pillow a great purchase- expensive and not completely necessary but it sure makes life a little easier.
customer_reviews.author: K. Grosse

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must for every mother! Yes it only lasts a few months but trust me those few months are worth it! My baby LOVES this... better than all the swings we've tried. You can move this easily from room to room or even outside. I take it when I go over to visit friends or family and my baby will just be content hanging out on it or nap on it. I couldn't live without this for the first few months of my babies life!
customer_reviews.author: EmilyMarie

customer_reviews.title: One of our best purchases
customer_reviews.text: We bought this off a whim before the baby arrived. I wasn't sure how or when I'd use it, but it is a staple in our house. This is perfect for feeding baby when you're exhausted, propping baby up, a great safe place to store baby when you're busy, perfect for grandparents or children to meet the new baby, and more. We've transitioned this into a way to help with supervised tummy time and a way to help relieve gas (it elevates the upper body so bicycles are more effective). I suggest new parents pick this up.
customer_reviews.author: Zoelle Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: I love our Boppy Lounger
customer_reviews.text: I love our Boppy Lounger! Our little girl is over 1 month old now, and we use it daily. Most of the time the pillow is in our living room, where she can relax while i can get stuff done or while i am sitting next to her ! And as others also already mentioned, its portable so whenever i leave the room i can just take her in there without waking her up (yes, she also takes naps in it at daytime, even when not recommended ). Great purchase and really worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Used. Dog hairs, rips, and stains. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: Completely unacceptable condition. This was supposed to be brand new. I opened the box and inside bag it comes in. I immediately saw a blemish/stain positioned about where a babies head would be while feeding or laying in the pillow. Gross. Then I see horrible off center stitching that is exposing material underneath on the bottom of the pillow. To top it all off, there’s a black dog hair.. and we don’t have pets. This clearly was a used item that was sold as new. I am disgusted by this considering it’s for my 5 week old baby. Unsanitary, not as described on website and downright hazardous.
customer_reviews.author: Nichelle Kinney

customer_reviews.title: No zipper
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is a great one to give support to your little one. Sometimes when you don’t want to put them down or they are also tired of laying you can certainly use this as it is very convenient. What I didn’t like is that the material is not as soft and also it doesn’t have a zipper!!!!! This is really what made me not love it because my baby spits up a lot and now I can’t just throw the cover in the wash; I actually have to throw the whole pillow what an inconvenience
customer_reviews.author: Samara davis

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for a family member who was having a baby. So many Moms said they couldn't live without their Boppy's so I decided it might be a great gift. So far there have been quite a few baby pictures taken while the new baby is in his Boppy Lounger. I'm guessing all those Moms were right. You really can't go wrong with buying a Boppy Lounger cause they are just so darn convenient and comfy for a newborn.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Extremely useful.. a must buy for newborns
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my one month old baby who didn’t want to sleep on crib. She always wanted to sleep on lap first amd then I had to keep her on crib.It was a tiresome routine to keep her always on lap . Then I ordered this. This has been extremely helpful. Now she always sleeps on it during the daytime and at night when she falla asleep ,I put her on crib. Though its written that boppy pillow is noy for sleeping purpose, still This serves my purpose very well. I always keep an eye on her while on this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: alokananda k.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Used this to sit baby in room to room to get things done around the house. Used it to help baby get sleepy walking him around the house while on it. Used it to block baby when he started to role. Used it as head support as baby got older. Now using it to block baby from crawling into unwanted places. Baby is 11 months. Must have purchase for all new moms and dads. One plus is that cradle sheets fit right over it and those can be easily washed and swapped out!
customer_reviews.author: lori d.

customer_reviews.title: YES YES YES!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Definitely on the newborn/ baby MUST HAVE list :) My daughter can comfortably lounge on the couch or bed with me. I also use it for baby pics by laying fuzzy blankets and such over it. Its a sweet backrest while breastfeeding and so many other things. I end up using this product every day. DEFINITELY WORTH THE BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Carma Sutra

customer_reviews.title: A must! Used it for sleep snaps hanging out, everything!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, great product. My daughter actually slept in this at night because she had acid reflux for the first three months because she fit in it and it was the best way for me to keep her propped up. I know it says not to let them sleep in it but she lived in this thing. Napped in it, slept in it, sat up and watched TV in it I mean we took it everywhere. Will definitely be buying another one of these for my next child. It’s perfect for everything and everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Not good if your baby has got acid reflux
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lounger. I only wish my LO loved it too. It doesn’t help him at all with his reflux. On the contrary, even after holding him for 30 minutes every time I feed him, I can’t put him on the lounger or he will definitely start burping considerably. I think this is a great convenient problem if your baby doesn’t have any reflux or stomach related problems. Also keep in mind that you ‘ll probably won’t be able to use it after your baby is 4 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to shower gift for new moms. A must have in my opinion! Also great for my son who has reflux because he doesn’t lay completely flat in it. I often set him in for the 30 minutes after feeding. He also takes supervised naps in it during the day. Can’t say enough great things about it.
customer_reviews.author: MamaRN23

customer_reviews.title: newborn essential
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy this initially thinking my baby could lounge in the Boppy nursing pillow. I quickly learned that wasn't the case. She would slide down and get all slouchy. However, I wanted something that would keep her slightly inclined after eating to help reduce spitting up. This was the perfect solution. We use it constantly. I also love that the entire thing is machine washable, so there's no need to buy multiple covers.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Penner

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: I was so torn to spend the money on this because I already had two of the ring boopys but they don’t really work for his age. I was hesitant because I felt like he will only fit in this on a short term basis. However, This was the best investment and totally worth the money. This is only the first day of using it and it has already been a lifesaver while feeding my son so he is propped up and doesn’t spit up also gives my arms a rest when feeding him and a safe place for him to be laying in to doze off to sleep before going into his pack and play.
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan

customer_reviews.title: So Useful, SoVersatile, Perfect Gift for a New Mother!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter when she told me she and her husband were expecting their first child. Oh, my goodness, she used it every day during the first many months of motherhood. In the early morning she would set it on the dining room table with the baby facing the large window that looks out to their back yard, and my grandbaby would be enthralled, watching the squirrels and birds play outside while my daughter prepared something for them to eat. As my grandson grows, he now uses it for a piece of furniture, kind of like a seat, lol. I'm sure it will be worth out long before they run out of uses for it!
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Harris

customer_reviews.title: Cozy - A little short
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this pillow so far. He is 6 weeks 4 days old and weighs 12 lbs - 22 in and it's a little smaller than I thought it would be/what I expected from the picture. I feel like the picture makes it look longer. His feet hang off, which is fine. Other than that he is super cozy, so no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Karley C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent...my baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this but accident thinking it was the breastfeeding pillow but my son LOVES it. Best mistake purchase ever! So convenient to put on the couch and set him down. Buying one for my mom to keep at her house. Only con is there is no cover or detachable cover so washing is a pain. Keep a swaddle or blanket over it.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Love love love but I have a caution for you....
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I went over to my sister's house and she had this for her son. I used it at her house and then went home and immediately order it for myself. So helpful!! My one word of caution.... I would caution that you always attend your baby and never put this on an elevated surface. When my baby got a little older she started to somehow get her little feet anchored on the bottom of the pillow and would push her self up over the top. Scared this mamma the first time she did it but luckily I was right there and I keep it on the floor so she didn't fall to the floor or something.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great for babies a little bigger than newborn
customer_reviews.text: Received as a gift. Couldn't use at first because baby was too small; not good for airway and breathing. We used a Dock-a-Tot until he was big enough for the boppy. But once he hit about 2.5 months we started using it and love it. I bought a second one for my mom's house. He's almost 4 months now and starting to grow out of it which is a bummer but it's been so useful. My baby doesn't like the 4moms rockaroo we have, so we use the Bobby instead. Would recommend. Oh and to keep it clean of spit up we just out a burp cloth under his head.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: can't live without my Boppy
customer_reviews.text: I have used this nearly every day since bringing home baby. She is now two months old and has used it every stinking day. Better than a dock a tot for two reasons: the price of the Boppy is awesome, and it has an incline. My baby has reflux, so putting her in the boppy after feeds so her head is elevated is a life saver since we can't hold her upright for an hour after every feed. Would recommend ANY family expecting a newborn to get one of these!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for newborns!
customer_reviews.text: I went back and forth on buying this but I’m glad that I did. We get a lot of use out of it and it’s pretty cheap. Nice material and well made. It comes in a plastic bag with a zipper. It’s a great little lounger. We use it every day for napping (short periods of time while supervised) and to just set the baby in for relaxing. My daughter is 2 months, just under 12lbs and 22 inches long, she still fits on it pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Sb1983Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Neat Product, Not Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: I love my Boppy newborn lounger. I use it everyday- it is a convenient way to set the baby down. (I keep it in my pack and play so that my toddler cannot reach the baby.) He is too young to roll or move on his own so this product works well for us. I do not like that the cover cannot be removed for cleaning. I am assuming the entire pillow would have to go in the washing machine if I had to clean it. That is definitely a negative for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen I

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy with purchase, smaller than expected, no removable cover
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pillow for a quick spot to place our newborn. It seems like she's really comfortable, and I appreciate the gradual incline and how it's bunched together at the bottom to form a little seat. I was expecting it to be a bit larger and imagine our 2 week old will outgrow it fairly quickly. I only wish it had a removable/washable cover, as it's really one diaper blowout or spit up episode away from being unusable due to difficulty to clean.
customer_reviews.author: WhompingWillow6291

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: This is a must-have for a newborn baby. We kept this on the couch the first few months of our baby's life and he lounged in it and napped in it right beside us. It seems very comfortable. Not super easy to clean, you have to put the whole thing in the washer BUT, we found that if we put a muslin blanket over it, that we could just change that out anytime the baby spit up instead of washing the entire poppy.
customer_reviews.author: danny

customer_reviews.title: A MUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: Omg this thing was my BEST baby purchase!!! My newborn and now 2 month old is in it all day everyday and LOVES IT. She loves that she can be perched up and hang out with everyone and naps in it all the time. When we eat dinner I throw this on the table and she sits with us. I’m literally going to give this as a baby shower gift at every single one I go to! I can’t rave about it enough. It’s not machine washable which stinks BUT you can spot clean it very easily...I have zero stains!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Webne

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed on how soft this pillow was and supports my baby pretty well. She will sleep in this for hours! I wouldn't say it puts her to sleep, cause she'll get fussy if I just put her in it. But if I put her in it after she falls asleep in my arms... she will stay asleep for hours! Of course this is not her main place to sleep. Its just during the day when I'm sitting next to her in the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Baby doesn't like it
customer_reviews.text: Probably nice product since so many positive review - our baby is not happy to lie down in it . So disappointing...but happy it work for others!
customer_reviews.author: L.K.

customer_reviews.title: Infant Must
customer_reviews.text: I could rave over this pillow for paragraphs! I purchased this pillow for my son at 4 months after finding out he loves the one at daycare. All the babies prefer it. He has torticollis (a tight neck muscle causing a left lean of his hed) and this pillow allows him to lay more natural, like being held rather than an infant chair where he slides down. It's firm in support but comfortable like a reclining chair for an adult. It still fits him great at 15lbs, 23 inches (size in picture).
customer_reviews.author: BWhitley

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the purchase for sure!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a life saver...my son had digestive/gas/reflux issues and would not lay flat for the first weeks of his life...this boppy was pretty much the only place he would sleep, other than on mommy or daddy's chest, lol. Well worth the purchase and not sure we would have made it through those first weeks without it. We did order a second and had an issue with the pillow not expanding completely or appropriately and had to return that one but still have and use the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Rigoberto Morales Jr

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: My LO loves this! He's slept in it on and off since birth (almost 3 months now). Perfect for feeding thru the night to keep baby positioned upright when falling asleep to prevent acid reflux. Then you can move baby to crib/bassinet once time has passed. We're also using it for tummy time! This boppy is a life saver! The only downfall is I wish it had a removable fabric to wash it instead of having to put the whole boppy in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Love this, but always supervise!
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves to spend time here! It has been a life saver for this momma whose husband had to leave for work right after birth. Lightweight and portable, this lounger travels with me to every room in the house. Always supervise your baby’s though! There have been a few times that I have needed to readjust him as he squiggles down. I highly recommend this product for new parents!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my nephew’s baby. Him and his girlfriend loved it. They could lay him down anywhere they were while he slept and keep an eye on him. They said he was very comfortable in it too and was never fussy!! Great gift for new Parents
customer_reviews.author: Michelle W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my little grandbaby.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been using this at home daily for my 5 month old preemie granddaughter for months. So when she came to visit me I bought one also. The baby loves to sit in it. It keeps her safe and secure and she doesn't have to lay totally flat on her back, which she likes. Looks like it will be a cinch to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Krissi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing!! Great for play time. Baby likes to sit in it and look around. It's super cozy for cuddling or short naps. I bought it for 7 week old. She's 13# and 10 weeks now and still fits good. Probably can use a few more weeks comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Denisse Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: During my newborns first 2 months she would refuse to sleep anywhere besides on my chest or on her boppy lounger. She loved being propped up to see the world around her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product but do not let your kids sleep in it. My twins are 5 months they like to wiggle right out of this and before you know it they are on the floor. But this is perfect when your feeding two. Also great product if your kids have really bad reflux. You want to keep that food down get one of these the elevation helps. Keeping your boppy from flattening out so much you want to flip these over every now and then.
customer_reviews.author: Twin&CavMom

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I received it as a give for my son and I used it more then I could even have imagined. When he was first born it fit him perfectly. I could lay him in it without fear of him falling out. The pillow held it shape well. Only thing is the fabric was not soft as I would have like. It was good for wiping off spit up or milk. Overall good product. I have since purchased two as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Baby MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: I originally didn't buy or register for this because I thought it was just like a pillow and not really necessary. My mom was given one by a family member and we tried it. I immediately bought one. He loves and it and its so easy to tote around the house to have places to set him in while doing chores. Just bought another one for a friend who's having a baby. A definite new baby MUST HAVE in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Rita M.

customer_reviews.title: Loved this!
customer_reviews.text: My youngest had colic and this was the only thing, besides my arms, I could get her to nap in for more than a couple minutes (she was always supervised when napping in this and was never left unattended or used at night). We used it daily for the first 4-5 months, until she started rolling over. Once she got past the colic around 3 months it was perfect for her to lay on when my oldest wanted to play with her. Definitely wish I would of had it for my other daughter!
customer_reviews.author: ColeS

customer_reviews.title: Multi-use Comfortable product
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love these Boppys, we use them all the time in the baby room and the living room. The babies are comfortable laying in them, they eat in them, and often sleep in them too (supervised). We can also sit them up now that they are older and they remain very comfortable in the Boppy, this is a life saver and a must for new parents especially.
customer_reviews.author: Abel Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Cozy baby and a help for mom/dad
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! My baby also loves this--at almost one month, my baby sits/sleeps in this lounger throughout the day while I'm able to get things done at home. One thing that I also LOVE, is that when there were diaper leaks the urine just pooled and i was able to sop it up with a paper towel and the fabric was still dry/ there was no stain.
customer_reviews.author: Lnsybee

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with this purchase...so many advantages!
customer_reviews.text: This Boppy is perfect for newborns and infants. My Granddaughter has a reflux issue, so she has to be elevated after nursing. This Boppy is perfect to move from location to location (nice handle) as well as transport for trips and visits. My daughter brings it to our house. Her Boppy and bouncy seat are her go to play seats during awake hours. This item is a nice gift for new parents too.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN K.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t feel safe
customer_reviews.text: Literally is a pillow with a dimple in it - will return as it feels like there may be a one month window when this thing is useful. Have hoped it would replace the new trendy Dock a tot which is way to expensive- but not so.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was necessary for us.
customer_reviews.text: My baby pretty much lived in this the first few weeks. It’s such a great place to plop baby; you can put it on the floor and carry it from room to room. We almost bought a second for downstairs. There isn’t a cover but we sometimes just lay a blanket over it. If baby needs to sit up after eating it’s perfect. When she outgrows it it’ll be a cat bed! He loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: Hillary S

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep aid yet!! Definitely would recommend it 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! It’s been hard to find something for our newborn to sleep in but after we got this he sleeps with no problems!! So good we actually ordered one for downstairs and one for upstairs lol For the price you cannot beat it and it’s soft
customer_reviews.author: DaniRay

customer_reviews.title: Love! Used daily.
customer_reviews.text: This lounger was a lifesaver for the first few months of my daughter's life. It seemed like whenever we weren't holding her, she was hanging out in this. She always seemed very comfortable, and it fit well in the couch next to me so she could watch while I folded laundry. I bought this a couple years ago and I don't believe the covers were out for it yet, so I did usually drape a receiving blanket over it before putting her in to help with cleanup of the inevitable spit up/blow out. So after a few months of daily use, it's still looking brand new!
customer_reviews.author: SarahT

customer_reviews.title: A must have for baby!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! We let our baby sleep in it in between my husband and I, she is four weeks old and only wakes up twice through the night since we started using it! She’s breastfed, so that’s saying a lot since breastfed babies normally wake up more to eat! It’s so comfortable, and I will recommend this to anyone for their registry or as a baby shower gift.
customer_reviews.author: June Taliaferro

customer_reviews.title: Best Baby Gift For New Parents!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the most practical baby gifts I've ever received makes a great gift to give others. I purchased this off of my cousins Amazon registry, and I've purchased previously when not on a registry. The cushion keeps new baby comfy and cozy while being lightweight and easy to clean. It is a win-win for parents of newborns through toddlers. My daughter is almost 2 and still uses it to lounge on. One of my top ten baby items for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Devan Brown

customer_reviews.title: Newborn loved it
customer_reviews.text: Loved this so much. Used very single day. Wish the cover was zipped tho to take it off and wash it. Other than that definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent deneen

customer_reviews.title: He and my sister both love it! My sister and I have both commented ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a baby gift for my newest nephew. He and my sister both love it! My sister and I have both commented that we wish they made one for adults - it looks so comfy! We were, however, surprised that the cover cannot be removed, nor does Boppy make a waterproof cover that you can purchase separately. The entire lounger can be tossed in the washer and dry, which is nice, but a removable waterproof cover would be a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: Everly

customer_reviews.title: Cool, comfortable, & easy to wash
customer_reviews.text: My son is 1 month old and, while he doesn't stay in it long, I can tell he is comfortable in it while he is waiting for me. I love how cool the fabric is and it's easy to clean. My friends recommended this to me and I'm excited to see how he enjoys this as he grows.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Must Have Baby Item!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It’s comfortable, perfectly sized, and so easy to clean! I have washed it several times in my washer and it retains its shape and color. I will definitely order again for others as a must have newborn gift! It’s such a handy comfortable spot for your baby to to relax and sit next to you.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Jensen

customer_reviews.title: A must have item!!
customer_reviews.text: Best product for the first 4-5 months of babies life!! My baby girl loved it and allowed us to have a few moments of hands free! I took this with me all over the house and even to work!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: One of our favorite things for baby
customer_reviews.text: Our baby boy absolutely loves his hoppy lounger. He likes to chill in it during the day and takes naps in it occasionally too (supervised). It’s soft yet firm. We also took newborn pictures on it just put a blanket over it. Super cute we love it! So do our pets!
customer_reviews.author: victoria

customer_reviews.title: Awkwardly Shaped
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I was able to use this for was to take quick pics of my baby. This is not at all comfortable and is shaped so awkwardly that baby cried anytime I put him in this while awake. The shape is not at all like in the picture where baby small or larger can comfortably " lounge" in this.
customer_reviews.author: alvernia242

customer_reviews.title: “Go to” baby shower gift from now on!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift for a one week old granddaughter and she has been asleep in it since! :) Such a great comfort to have for a new mother so she doesn’t have to struggle carrying around something heavy while still sore and tired and the baby is content as can be in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Before my daughter was born, I was actually using this as back support for myself while in bed. So, once she out grows it I will most likely be keeping it to use for this purpose once again. I don't lie her down on the pillow often; my little one does a lot of sleeping. I do, however, bring this pillow with me into the bathroom and rest her on it while I'm doing things in there. I don't feel comfortable leaving her in the bassinet alone just yet!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have!
customer_reviews.text: This was the best thing I got for my baby shower and the most useful. It elevated my baby’s head when she was sick and she didn’t slide out. It helped with her reflux after feedings. She is a year and half and she loves her pillow still and will pick it up and move it to lounge on the floor for any videos or just if she gets tired. I’m having a 2nd and will be getting another—- only cons.. I wish it had a cover so I could wash just that and not the whole pillow, I also wish they made a larger toddler sized one
customer_reviews.author: Pump man

customer_reviews.title: A Must For Newborns!
customer_reviews.text: I did not know how much I needed this until we got it. So helpful to have a place to put the baby where they can watch everything and give your arms a break now and then! Although they're not supposed to sleep in this my daughter took daily naps very comfortably on it. Definitely would have put this on my registry if I had known about it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: AMA

customer_reviews.title: You need this!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best baby purchases I made! Baby loves it and I love it. It’s easy to move around if you need to be in different rooms, and it has a handle which is convenient when you’re carrying baby in one arm. It has a zip up cover for protection and it’s really soft!
customer_reviews.author: kgall

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 3 month old granddaughter. She has one at home, but it is much larger. I did not realize they came in different sizes, as this was the only size offered. She loves her lager one, but hates this one. Her feet hang over the side, a I assume she does not feel secure. For me it was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt live without mine... baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: My baby naps in this (supervised) tonhelpneithbher reflux. I love the fact thatvthisbalsonfits into her bassinet, pack & play, and comfortably on my lap as well! I did order a third party waterproof cover for it after a few weeks. Spit up happens and I wanted to preserve the pillow as much as possible. My baby is fairly long and skinny and she has fit in it comfortably from day 3 when we got home. A life/back saver! Great gift for a baby shower!
customer_reviews.author: Cristy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every stage of your baby
customer_reviews.text: My best purchase ever! I bought it when my daughter was 3 weeks old and immediately she loved it. She slept there, I could play with her easily. I put it under the gym toy when she was too small and she could play with her toys. Now she is 5 months old and she stays there a lot with her toys moving her leg. Definitely, I live this pillow. I bought the cover so I can remove and wash just it and not all the pillow.
customer_reviews.author: katia

customer_reviews.title: So Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed on the product. Soft n plush as it statesaa "lounger"." My daughter really loves relaxing in it. The only things I'd say, even though it's for "newborn" is to be longer in length as my daughter is really tall.
customer_reviews.author: Gess

customer_reviews.title: So convenient and effective to have this for my baby!
customer_reviews.text: So convenient and effective to have this for my baby! I felt it was very safe, then again, baby was always being watched for, and never experienced a wrong rollover and fall or otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Los

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, high quailty
customer_reviews.text: My son will be here any day and his nursery is elephant theme. I can’t wait to put this to use! I washed it as soon as it came in and it’s perfectly intact. It’s so cute. I will be using this in the daily EDIT: my son LOVES his boppy! Super cute and easy to wash
customer_reviews.author: MadedJystery

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and helpful!
customer_reviews.text: My friend loved this!! She said it helped her so much when she was breastfeeding at night, and partially falling asleep while doing it. She would wake up and get scared! But her baby was okay resting on this pillow :) she uses it often, and it's very supportive for the baby.
customer_reviews.author: Punk lily

customer_reviews.title: Pretty useful... if you disregard the warnings.
customer_reviews.text: Like another mom posted, I rated this so highly because of the uses the manufacturer advises against. Invaluable in the first few weeks of infancy, less useful thereafter. We plan on passing it around with our siblings for their newborns. We're at 6 weeks and still using it. Baby likes it better than lying flat on his back, and it's great for daytime napping, or giving the baby a secure perch in bed with a napping, exhausted mom or dad.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer X

customer_reviews.title: This was a life saver
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is currently 2 months old and has used this since the day she came home from the hospital! It has been a life saver. It cradles her enough that she is comfortable and secure. It is small enough to take anywhere and has the handle on it to make it easy to transport. I love this product so much, I bought one as a baby gift for a family member.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Deneice Brown

customer_reviews.title: God sent! Use this on top of the bed ...
customer_reviews.text: God sent ! Use this on top of the bed against wall . ( we have a huge bed ) when me and hubby are being lazy to put baby back into crib after breastfeeding . She’s knocks out in this quick .
customer_reviews.author: Ivana Williams

customer_reviews.title: head to low
customer_reviews.text: my daughter used It twice and on the third try, she didnt like sitting back or Putting her head back, so I Washed it and she Put her head back, then she Screams so I Put my jacket under the head part and she was fine
customer_reviews.author: jacoches808

customer_reviews.title: Better not to leave a baby unattended once it figures ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish we got this earlier - it's been the primary place to put our baby between month 1 and month 3. Now that she passed 3 months she's becoming too tall for it. Be careful as the baby can use its feet to shift upwards, risking the head falling behind the pillow. Better not to leave a baby unattended once it figures it out.
customer_reviews.author: Marcin

customer_reviews.title: First time mom must have
customer_reviews.text: I love my boppy lounger. By baby really likes lounging in it more than any seat! It’s comforting to him and also kind of hugs him. I definitely recommend this product if you have a newborn or are a first time mom
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: This Bobby lounger has been a lifesaver we have used it in so many ways will be quite sad when she grows out of it
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Waites

customer_reviews.title: Great for fussy babies
customer_reviews.text: my son was very fussy as a new born so we needed to keep him close. This boppy allowed for us to take naps with him close by. Super comfortable, he never minded being on it. We also use it for tummy time, and learning to balance while sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good lounger
customer_reviews.text: Yes this is indeed best baby lounger, my baby relaxes here after drinking milk and burping for at least 1 hour with out crying. If I lay her flat she cries, so this lounger came as a rescue for the babies who has colic and reflex this is good.
customer_reviews.author: buchi113

customer_reviews.title: My sons favorite
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son while pregnant. Loved the elephant detail on it and neutral color. When he arrived, he LOVED this. I mean the first 5 months of his life were spent on this. I brought it everywhere with us. I have it stored away because it became apart of so many of our first memories together. I highly recommend it to all moms to be.
customer_reviews.author: david romas

customer_reviews.title: Great, but only for the short term
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Only down side for us personally is the amount of time we were able to use the product. Unlike the regular Bobby that has multiple uses throughout your babies size, this item really can only be enjoyed during the early weeks. Our baby was 8lbs and 21in when born and already was on the edges of the pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Babezilla90

customer_reviews.title: Babies love it!
customer_reviews.text: Since I went be what our younger son and his wife use the same newborn lounger and said that their daughter loved it, I went ahead and bought it for our older son and his wife for their son who will be born June 23! We are certain he will love the feel of it too!
customer_reviews.author: Lindy Siegismund

customer_reviews.title: Top of the baby list.  It was worth every penny and more
customer_reviews.text: Baby number #2 for me!!!!! Im only buying a new boppy because I gave my first boppy to a friend. She is still using The one I gave her. I really think you should give it a try. You will luv as much as I do
customer_reviews.author: Pam Frazier

customer_reviews.title: MUST for a newborn!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow has been a lifesaver - the baby loves it and it keeps him quiet after feedings. It also allows me to easily move him around the house, easy to clean, and easy to carry with you when traveling. Everyone needs one of these for their baby!
customer_reviews.author: TravelLoveHappiness

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: I 100% recommend this for all babies. Our 5 month old has been using this since birth and it’s the safest way to feed her and if we both fell asleep during her eating she was safe and wouldn’t be suffocating by an accident. It was my biggest fear as a 1st time mommy.
customer_reviews.author: idomakeupnhair

customer_reviews.title: Yay!  Finally some hands free moments!
customer_reviews.text: I love my baby girl, but she demands to be held all the time! The boppy lounger provides some hands free time -- quite the life saver for a new parent! She resisted the Fisher Price Rocker Sleeper, the mamaroo, her crib... Yay for the Boppy Infant lounger!
customer_reviews.author: K. Chen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because my daughter didn't want to be in her other boppy anymore. I use this to sit her in on my bed when I can't hold her anymore or as a way to prop her up after I breastfeed. I also feed her her baby food in this since she can't sit up by herself at this point. The only thing is that I wish the cover could come off for easier cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria H.

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: We love this lounger! The baby loves it too! She would relax in it for hours looking very comfortable taking naps or watching TV. I wish it came with a removable cover that can be washed, I'm hesitant to put it in the washing machine for the fear of it getting ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Alseku

customer_reviews.title: Must need for newborn
customer_reviews.text: My newborn baby boy loved this thing! He could lounge on this all day if I let him. He’s now 3 months and doesn’t use it as much but he sure used the heck out of it. It’s super soft and easy to wipe away baby’s spit up/ drool. Definitely need for a new baby
customer_reviews.author: Carina  Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Useful for a short period of time
customer_reviews.text: We used this for the first two weeks after bringing our son home. It was nice to have initially to set baby down after a c-section. Unfortunately the angle of this made his reflux worse, not raised enough. Now that he’s a month and on reflux meds we gave it another try, and he’s more content in a bouncer, swing, or a play gym.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Baby & I love it
customer_reviews.text: My baby will eventually get tired of being in her swing and will want her boppy! She prefers her boppy more than anything ! I highly recommend this item it’s really useful and baby takes good naps on it ! We started putting her in it since 2 days old !
customer_reviews.author: Angelica garcia

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: This lounger is fine. It'll do the trick for the newborn stage. I have a very wriggly, active baby so she outgrew this around 4 months because she would stiffen her legs and push herself up and over so that her head hung over the back of it. In comparison, the Leachco lounger still fits her.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: ... just want to free your hands this pillow is amazing. I know it says not to let the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is literally a game changer when you need to do things or just want to free your hands this pillow is amazing. I know it says not to let the baby nap in it but my baby has multiple times and he sleeps so well and it helps me get things done.
customer_reviews.author: Sammi

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: The best baby gift ever! Our go-to baby shower gift to all our new parent friends. They love it too!!! It’s nit something typically on a registry, it’s a hidden gem! Seriously MUST HAVE for newborns. Until they start rolling, of course. Easy to clean. Just throw in washing machine. Great support. Has the perfect incline. I never write reviews but this is seriously the best and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully comfortable for baby and parents!
customer_reviews.text: Our baby loved this lounger. Although you're not "allowed" to let your baby sleep in this, she would just doze off. We also really liked that it was very easy to carry around to friends homes and that it was very supportive for her back and neck. Our sister has the "dock-a-tot" and she was envious of this lounger, even though its hundreds of dollars cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: David&Tanya

customer_reviews.title: New mom cannot live without!
customer_reviews.text: Gifted to a new mom and she is in love with this! It has made such a difference in freeing up hands for a bit and seeing baby snuggled in perfectly safe. The perfect gift for mom and baby
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

product_meta.title: Boppy Original Newborn Lounger, Elephant Love Gray
product_meta.description: The Boppy Newborn Lounger is the perfect place for wee ones to coo and kick in comfort. It is uniquely designed with a recessed interior perfect for a newborn's bottom. This must-have for newborns is a lifesaver for moms and dads. It allows parents to interact with baby hands-free. Use it until baby reaches 16 pounds or can roll over on his own. A convenient carrying handle and lightweight design make this baby pillow a portable must-have. And because babies are cute but messy, the easy-clean fabric means you simply wipe the cover clean after every oops. Designed for baby's awake time.
feature_bullets: THE PERFECT NEST: Perfect place for newborns to kick and coo in comfort and provide you with a hands-free moment. Designed with a unique recessed interior to cradle baby’s bottom, keeping your baby relaxed and safe. Designed for your baby's supervised, awake time.
PORTABLE DESIGN: Grab and go - soft, lightweight fabric with convenient handle for easy travel from house-to-house or room-to-room.
EASY CARE, MACHINE WASHABLE: Easy-wipe fabric for the little messes and machine washable pillow for the big ones.

AWARD-WINNING QUALITY: The Boppy Newborn Lounger has won several awards voted on by parents and the baby community. The most recent wins are from the 2017 What to Expect Mom Must-Have Finalist, the 2018 BabyCenter Mom’s Pick Finalist and the Mom’s Choice Award.
Product dimensions 18 x 7 x 18 inches. Do not use for sleeping

specifications.Additional product features: Easy care, machine wash entire pillow
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars4,372 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
